trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, representa um arquivo de dados para escrita e leitura anotações do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> para o arquivo.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> is added to the store its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Quando um novo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>é adicionado ao arquivo respetivo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>propriedade está definida para um novo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: When AddAnnotation is called, its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property is checked to see if the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added to the store.
trans-unit.target: Quando é chamado AddAnnotation, respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>propriedade é verificada para ver se o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>já foi adicionado ao arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> property) an <xref:System.ArgumentException> error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>já foi adicionado e existe no arquivo de (conforme determinado pela sua <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A>propriedade) um <xref:System.ArgumentException>erros é acionado.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>

trans-unit.source: The annotation to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: A anotação para adicionar ao arquivo.

trans-unit.source: newAnnotation is .
trans-unit.target: newAnnotationis .

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property value already exists in the store.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>valor da propriedade já existe na loja.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an anchor on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma âncora em qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> na loja é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The AnchorChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: O evento AnchorChanged pode ser utilizado para monitorizar as alterações para a anotação <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>contido no arquivo de sem a necessidade de se registar em cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an author on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um autor em qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> na loja é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged> event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>evento pode ser utilizado para monitorizar as alterações para a anotação <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A>contido no arquivo de sem a necessidade de se registar em cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Authors%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados das memórias intermédias de anotação estão escrita imediatamente para o arquivo de dados físicos.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `false` and call <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: As aplicações que utilizam um modelo de explícita guardar podem definir AutoFlush `false` e chame <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>diretamente quando adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set AutoFlush to `true` to cause <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A> to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: As aplicações que utilizam um modelo de implícita guardar podem definir AutoFlush `true` para fazer com que <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>a chamar automaticamente depois de cada operação de arquivo (adicionar, eliminar ou modificar).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados das memórias intermédias de anotação estão a ser escritos imediatamente para o arquivo de dados físico para cada operação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se os dados no memórias intermédias anotação são escrita quando a aplicação explicitamente chama <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Flush*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cargo on any <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> in the store changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma carga em qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> na loja é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The CargoChanged event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A> contained in the store without the need to register on each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> individually.
trans-unit.target: O evento CargoChanged pode ser utilizado para monitorizar as alterações para a anotação <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>contido no arquivo de sem a necessidade de se registar em cada <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation>individualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Cargos%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Elimina a anotação com especificado <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>da loja.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>propriedade da anotação será eliminada.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation that was deleted; otherwise, if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: A anotação foi eliminada; caso contrário, se uma anotação com especificado annotationId não foi encontrado no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.
trans-unit.target: Versões todos os recursos geridos e utilizados pela loja.

trans-unit.source: Applications should call Dispose when finished with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.
trans-unit.target: As aplicações devem chamar Dispose quando terminar com <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose the application can release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose a aplicação pode de versão todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>para permitir que o recoletor de lixo reclamar a memória que a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>foi occupying.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method calls the protected <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose público chama o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>protegido `(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro de `true` para libertar todos os recursos geridos e não geridos.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Call Dispose before the last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> is released.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chamar eliminar antes da última referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>é libertado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: If Dispose is not called, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se não for chamado Dispose, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>recursos não irão ser libertados até que o recoletor de lixo chama o arquivo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pela loja e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This protected Dispose method is called by the public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>and <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Esta protegido Dispose método é denominado pelo público <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose`(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O público <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>invoca o Dispose protegido`(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes Dispose with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca Dispose com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, Dispose releases all resources held by any managed objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, objetos de versões de Dispose todos os recursos retidos por qualquer gerido que o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: Dispose also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Dispose também invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Guarantees that <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> will eventually be called for this store.
trans-unit.target: Garante que <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>, eventualmente, será chamado para este arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui base <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application program should not call Finalize directly.
trans-unit.target: O programa de aplicação não deve chamar Finalize diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Finalize is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Finalizar é invocado automaticamente durante a recolha de lixo, exceto se desativado por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [finalizar métodos e os processos de destruição](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Forces any annotation data retained in internal buffers to be written to the underlying storage device.
trans-unit.target: Força quaisquer dados de anotação retidos na internas memórias intermédias de escrita para o dispositivo de armazenamento subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an explicit-save model can set <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `false` and call Flush directly when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Podem definir as aplicações que utilizam um modelo de explícita guardar <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>para `false` e chame o esvaziamento diretamente quando for adequado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applications that use an implicit-save model can set the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A> to `true` to cause Flush to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).
trans-unit.target: Podem definir as aplicações que utilizam um modelo de implícita guardar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>para `true` para fazer com que o esvaziamento a chamar automaticamente depois de cada operação de arquivo (adicionar, eliminar ou modificar).</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AutoFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the annotation with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> from the store.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a anotação com especificado <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>da loja.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*> property of the annotation to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>propriedade da anotação devem ser devolvidos.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Id*>

trans-unit.source: The annotation with the given annotationId; or , if an annotation with the specified annotationId was not found in the store.
trans-unit.target: A anotação com o fornecido annotationId ; ou , se uma anotação com especificado annotationId não foi encontrado no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the annotations in the store.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma lista de todas as anotações no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The list of all annotations currently contained in the store.
trans-unit.target: A lista de todas as anotações atualmente contido no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called on the store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado no arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of annotations that have <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*> with locators that begin with a matching <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma lista de anotações que tenham <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>com localizadores que começam com uma correspondência <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sequência.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.Anchors*>

trans-unit.source: This GetAnnotations method internally uses the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> class to search and match for the annotations to return.
trans-unit.target: Este método de GetAnnotations internamente utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>classe para pesquisar e corresponder para as anotações devolver.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: The starting <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"></xref> sequence to return matching annotations for.
trans-unit.target: A iniciar <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart"> </xref> sequência para devolver anotações correspondentes para.

trans-unit.source: The list of annotations that have with locators that start and match the given anchorLocator; otherwise, if no matching annotations were found.
trans-unit.target: A lista de anotações que tenham com localizadores que começam e correspondem a indicado anchorLocator ; caso contrário, se nenhum anotações correspondentes foram encontradas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>ter sido chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*> has been called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>foi chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AnchorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.AuthorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.CargoChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore.StoreContentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> is added to or deleted from the store.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> é adicionado ao ou eliminado a partir da loja.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto a utilizar como um bloqueio de sincronização para <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> secções críticas.

trans-unit.source: The object to use as a synchronization lock for <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> critical sections.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a utilizar como um bloqueio de sincronização para <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> secções críticas.
